books.title: The Host
books.author: Stephanie Meyer
books.quote: Perhabs there could be no joy on this planet without an equal weight of pain to balance it out on some unknown scale.

books.title: The Book Thief
books.author: Markus Zusak
books.quote: I have hated words and I have loved them, and I hope I have made them right.

books.title: Hidden Pictures
books.author: Jason Rekulak
books.quote: We don/’t know how much our bodies can endure until we make cruel demands of them.

books.title: Laura Dean Keeps Breaking Up with Me
books.author: Mariko Tamaki, Rosemary Valero-O'Connell
books.quote: It's true that giving can be a part of love. But, contrary to popular belief, love should never take from you

books.title: The School for Good Mothers
books.author: Jessamine Chan
books.quote: She never thought of herself as living in a city full of children, but maybe every city and every neighborhood is full of children when you/’ve lost your own.

books.title: The Institute
books.author: Stephen King
books.quote: It came to him, with the force of a revelation, that you had to have been imprisoned to fully understand what freedom was.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.quote: The only way to learn is to live.

books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.quote: Everyone has secrets. It's just a matter of finding out what they are.
